comment: The tax on coal was introduced on 01/05/2013. The recorded tax rate for coal is the full (unweighted) rate in force from that date onward.

The tax rate on coal was EUR10/tCO2 between 01/01/2014 and 31/04/2014 and EUR20/tCO2 between 01/05/2014 and 31/12/2014. The reported tax rate is the weighted average (pro rata temporis) of these two rates.

The tax rate on coal was EUR20/tCO2 between 01/01/2020 and 30/04/2014 and EUR26/tCO2 between 01/05/2020 and 31/12/2020. The reported tax rate is the weighted average (pro rata temporis) of these two rates.
